text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I di-di-di-di-did iiiiit! 
A new personal beeeest!!

It's the third day of the summer camp. Each one of these 
days had been spent tirelessly training with El Condor Pasa 
under the blazing sun.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Don't underestimate horsegirls from the land 
of scorching hot sun! Hot winds! Hot sands! 
Hot hearts! They don't scare me!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Okay, we're running from one end 
of the beach to the other next～～!!

El Condor Pasa's been increasingly upbeat since arriving here. 
It's my job to respond to her enthusiasm ——

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: —— Trainer, are you listening!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Whaaaa～～, again!?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure you were just thinking about training 
again, right? You didn't hear anything I said 
about the festival yesterday either……

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
You've been focusing on work aaaall camp long and 
haven't paid El aaany attention!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nice El only appears three times! If you ignore her again she'll become Angry, Furious, Exploding Volcano El～!
choice_data_list: Sorry, I'll be attentive next time.
Sorry, I'll be attentive next time.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Good! Let me go back to what I was saying then.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Everything is set! Wear clothing that's easy to move in for 
"El's Amazing Shocking Training From Hell!" tonight!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Yeees, it's just me and you, Trainer! 
Side by side, going through hellish training!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
I have everything ready for us to run together! 
Like training tires and such!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… You wouldn't go and say that you forgot, now would you, Traineeer?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: It's completely impossible that you'd suddenly tell me "Did you mention this?", "I don't remember hearing this", or anything, right the moment before, isn't iiit?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Oh boy～ I'm so excited for tonight!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
If we're the greatest tag team, then of course 
you can at least follow me into the ring, right?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
First we go running along the shore and dive into the ocean… 
After that, we'll climb and slide down hills in the forest…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hehe, let's train hard now that we're at camp! I'm not going to hold anything back!
—— Looks like there's no way out of this one.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Two pairs of wings glisten in the night sky! 
Endowed with the blessings of the heavens, 
El Condor Pasa maaakes her entraaance!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Let the training from hell begin! ¡Vamos! 
Trainer, a few words on how you feel right now?!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Guau! You seem to be in high spirits!! 
Let's see how long that laaasts…!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: We. Are. Heeeeeeere!!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Indeed! The sparkling, joyful, summer festival!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: This is where you'll be training to recharge your body and mind!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Because lately you're only ever engrossed in work 
and more work! Even during breaks and at meals 
you kept holding on to your papers!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Going to bed late and waking up early! 
… You've been lacking sleep, haven't you?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: So it's time to catch up hard on all the fun you missed out on!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Mmn? I can smell a spicy aroma coming from further in! Definitely tacos! Quick, let's dash over to buy some!
choice_data_list: Now just a jolly second there!
Now just a jolly second there!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
No, no, the seconds are wasting! We're here to have 
a great, exciting, awesome time at the festivaaal!

From there, El Condor Pasa took me by the hand 
and led me around the various stalls…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nmunch, agh, Hrainer. Wand to gnom golfizh sgoobing negxt?
choice_data_list: Swallow that down first, will ya?
Swallow that down first, will ya?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Gulp…… ahaha, you're finally back to your old self.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's the spirit! Keep it going, let me see that smile! 
Relax when you need to, and put in the effort when required.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Relax and just be yourself! 
Otherwise future me will have a problem.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's right. Did you hear what I always said? I will become 
a horsegirl whose name will go down in history.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Papa's a pro wrestler, and just like him, I'm going to win 
a ton of tournaments! To cheers and endless applause! 
And in the center, two figures will stand!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And I will point to the one next to me, and say; "A big round 
of applause for my trainer, who made me into a champion!"…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. Though I'm just repeating what papa said…

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
That's why I need you to be in good spirits at all 
times, Trainer, or future me will have a problem.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Because we'll only become the mightiest together.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: …… You'll keep this promise with me, right?

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
¡Bueno! A good, strong reply! 
It was worth bringing you here!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Then it's really getting time to start 
the "Festival training from hell"!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Noo! Those tacos and takoyaki and yakisoba were a pre-training meal!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
The Summer Festival has only just begun! Now that 
we're here, we're going to visit aaall of the stalls!

My first rest in a long while was thus spent 
having a grand time with El Condor Pasa.
